definition: male/Baron, lowest of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/CL:個|个[ge4]
variant of 人[ren2]/"person" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 10), occurring in 兒, 兀, 兄 etc
real men do not easily cry (idiom)
pinyin: nan2 er2 you3 lei4 bu4 qing1 tan2

sentences.english: Li is a man of indomitable spirit that good.
sentences.chinese: 立是希望好男儿顶天立地。

sentences.english: The little boy talked as if he were an adult.
sentences.chinese: 这个小男儿讲起话来像大人。

sentences.english: Sons of Gondor! Of Rohan! My brothers.
sentences.chinese: 刚铎和洛汗的好男儿，我的好兄弟。

sentences.english: In the hour of danger, they have drawn no invidious distinctions between the sons of Virginia.
sentences.chinese: 危机时刻，他们不对弗吉尼亚男儿作令人反感的区分。

sentences.english: The Chinese nation possesses thousands upon thousands of men of courage and uprightness .
sentences.chinese: 中华民族有着成千上万的血性男儿。

sentences.english: You are a 3 dimentional human with many wonderful traits.
sentences.chinese: 你是一个三尺男儿，你有许多优点。

sentences.english: He is a man of heart.
I finally got to return to Wuhan for the first time since leaving My Hero.
sentences.chinese: 终于在离开好男儿之后第一次回到武汉。

sentences.english: These are the Duranin, (of)honor within , (and of)fear without .
sentences.chinese: 杜兰宁男儿，心存荣耀，无所畏惧。

sentences.english: If a man wants to achieve what he wishes, Read the five sutras in front of the window.
sentences.chinese: 男儿欲遂平生志，五经勤向窗前读。

sentences.english: FY-chi man; do not show, and air negative natural bachi footer.
sentences.chinese: 男儿不展风云志，空负天生八尺躯。

sentences.english: Whether you are a warm-blooded son, or a teenage girl who love table tennis.
sentences.chinese: 不论你是热血男儿，还是巾帼不让须眉的乒坛少女。

sentences.english: Roy:But come on. I was born a man, there's no reason I would want to stay a woman.
sentences.chinese: 拜托，我生来就是男儿身，我没理由会想一直做女人。

sentences.english: And see warm-blooded son, Yang I the great power.
sentences.chinese: 且看热血男儿，扬我中华神威。

sentences.english: About the relationship between violence and manhood?
sentences.chinese: 这告诉了我们暴力与男儿气概之间存在何种关系？
他是一个真正的好男儿。

definition: a manly man/a man of character

pinyin: nan2 zi3 han4 da4 zhang4 fu5

definition: to be buried in a horse hide (idiom)/to give one's life on the battlefield
to aspire to travel far and make one's mark (idiom)
guard home, defend the country (idiom); national defense
(idiom) to compare favorably with men in terms of ability, bravery etc/to be a match for men/lit. not conceding to men (beard and eyebrows)
